Welcome to lostinmsh’s documentation!

GMSH toolbox for T-coforme meshes on polygon.

class lostinmsh.AutoCircular(*, border_factor: float, thickness_factor: float | None = None)

Auto circular

border_factor

a

Type:

float

thickness_factor

b

Type:

Optional[float] = None

get_border(points: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]]) → Circular

Auto set.

Parameters:

points (NDArray) – list of points should be an array of shape (N, 2) with N ≥ 1.

class lostinmsh.AutoRectangular(*, border_factor: float, thickness_factor: float | None = None)

Auto circular

get_border(points: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]]) → Rectangular

Auto set.

class lostinmsh.Circular(*, center: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], thickness: float | None = None, radius: float)

Circular boundary.

dist_to_inner_boundary(points: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]]) → float

Sign distance to the inner boundary.

It is positive is all the points are inside and it is negative if at least one point is outside.

class lostinmsh.Geometry(*, polygons: list[lostinmsh.polygon.Polygon], border: Border)

Geometry class.

Get the critical interval.

make_center_origin()

Do a translation to set the center at (0, 0).

Maximum corner radius.

class lostinmsh.Rectangular(*, center: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], thickness: float | None = None, half_width: float, half_height: float)

Rectangular boundary.

Sign distance to the inner boundary.

It is positive is all the points are inside and it is negative if at least one point is outside.

lostinmsh.mesh(geom: Geometry, mesh_size: float, *, element_order: int = 1, terminal: bool = False, gui: bool = False, filename: None | str | PurePath = None, msh_file_version: float | None = None, save_width: int | None = None, save_height: int | None = None, save_compress: bool = False, hide_model_Entities: bool = True) → None | str | PurePath
